message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this valuable product. I'm asking for $18,000. I know it's a significant investment, but I'm confident it will provide you with substantial value.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $15,000.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $18,000 is really the lowest I can go. This product is in high demand and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
